#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
	ll t,n;
	ll i,x;
	ll ans=1;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=1;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&x);
			ans=((ans%mod)*(x%mod))%mod;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
